summary.span: 可对从生成到宿主的访问进行调停的宿主服务的实现。

span.span: Implementation of a host service that mediates access from the build to the host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 另请参阅 。See also .

summary.span: 在命名或重命名一个项目时更新宿主服务表。

span.span: Updates the host services table when a project is named or renamed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为项目提供新的完整路径并且旧路径为空时, 该项目将命名为。A project is named when it is given a new full path and the old path is null.
